future go to the free graphs and assembly instructions here 2 **description ** put the oo in spooky season with this eye-catching scarf the gloria ghost scarf the combination of the cute ghost and the glow in the dark yarn helps to take the season from scary to fun with only some yarn and your crochet hook this design is worked from the ends of the scarf toward the center in 2 separate pieces in back and forth row this pattern includes both the graph and written instructions for the ghosts and the scarf pieces as well as some tips on how to keep your ghost tidy and readable with a little fringe and some bright light this scarf will be your favorite halloween season accessory this pdf includes the print graph written instructions and assembly instructions images of the graphs and the written instructions for seaming are available on divinedebris com the sample in the photos was made in basic stitch anti-pilling yarn by lion brand yarn 3 and diy glow by lion brand yarn 4 affiliate
